author: fielding
msg: Add a program for listing who voted on a given issue for testing quorum.
Strictly speaking, this can already be figured out by the monitors by
the number of double-hashed id's received, but many folks also want
to know what members of the group are participating in the election.

author: fielding
msg: minor tweaks needed to get through some people's sp*m avoidance
and give more info to monitors

author: fielding
msg: Add support for Single Transferable Vote (STV)
Replace Unix-based voting groups with file-defined voting groups

author: fielding
msg: instructions for how the voter tool works and known bugs

author: fielding
msg: Prevent locale from affecting the date format.
